tool_description: The Studio Ghibli API catalogs the people, places, and things found in the worlds of Ghibli. It was created to help users discover resources, consume them via HTTP requests, and interact with them in whatever way makes sense. Navigation can be found on the left sidebar, and the right sidebar shows examples of returned objects for successful calls.
name: Studio Ghibli
title: Studio Ghibli

api_list.name: Vehicle ID
Vehicles
api_list.description: The Vehicles endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli vechiles. This includes cars, ships, and planes.

api_list.name: Species ID
Species
api_list.description: The Species endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli species. This includes humans, animals, and spirits et al.

api_list.name: Location ID
Return all locations
api_list.description: The Locations endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli locations. This broadly includes lands, countries, and places.

api_list.name: People ID
api_list.description: Returns a person based on a single ID

api_list.name: Return all people
api_list.description: The People endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli people. This broadly includes all Ghibli characters, human and non-.

api_list.name: Film ID
api_list.description: Returns a film based on a single ID

api_list.name: Return all films
api_list.description: The Films endpoint returns information about all of the Studio Ghibli films.
